subject: Football
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: A 41-year-old Chicago woman pleaded not guilty to charges she killed the pregnant girlfriend of the former Bears safety Shaun Gayle. Prosecutors say Marni Yang shot Rhoni Reuter, 42, because she was jealous of Reuter’s relationship with Gayle.
snippet: A 41-year-old Chicago woman pleaded not guilty to charges she killed the pregnant girlfriend of the former Bears safety Shaun Gayle. Prosecutors say Marni Yang shot Rhoni Reuter, 42, because she was jealous of Reuter’s relationship with Gayle.
